act.title: The Wild life (Specified plant stock declaration) central rules, 19951
act.article:
1 Short title and commencement.—
1 These rules may be called the Wild Life (Specified Plant Stock Declaration) Central Rules, 1995.
2 These rules shall come into force from the date of commencement of provisions of Chapter IIIA of the Wild Life (Protection) Act, 1972.

2 Declaration of stocks by a cultivator or dealer in specified plants, parts and derivatives thereof.—Every cultivator of specified plants and the dealer in specified plants and derivatives thereof shall, within 30 days from the commencement of provisions of Chapter IIIA of Wild Life (Protection) Act, 1972, declare his stocks specified plants, parts and derivatives thereof, as the case may be, as on the date of such declaration to the Chief Wildlife Warden in the form given below:

[See section 17E and sub-section (2) of section 44]
